Arrivals at specific times

Generator convenience function to generate arrivals at specific times.

at(...)

Arguments

...
a vector or multiple parameters of times at which to initiate an arrival.

Value

Returns a generator function.

See also

add_generator.

Examples

t0 <- create_trajectory() %>% timeout(0)
env <- simmer(verbose=TRUE) %>%
  add_generator("dummy", t0, at(0, c(1,10,30), 40, 43)) %>%
  run(100)
#>          0 | generator: dummy          |       new: dummy0         | 0
#>          0 | generator: dummy          |       new: dummy1         | 1
#>          0 | generator: dummy          |       new: dummy2         | 10
#>          0 | generator: dummy          |       new: dummy3         | 30
#>          0 | generator: dummy          |       new: dummy4         | 40
#>          0 | generator: dummy          |       new: dummy5         | 43
#>          0 |   arrival: dummy0         |  activity: Timeout        | 0
#>          1 |   arrival: dummy1         |  activity: Timeout        | 0
#>         10 |   arrival: dummy2         |  activity: Timeout        | 0
#>         30 |   arrival: dummy3         |  activity: Timeout        | 0
#>         40 |   arrival: dummy4         |  activity: Timeout        | 0
#>         43 |   arrival: dummy5         |  activity: Timeout        | 0
#>
